Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel for a short stay in Rome”
Reviews.Author: aga s
Reviews.Content: reading trip advisor decided book 3 nights stay 2 people hotel piave easy hotel train station 15min walk bit price localisation couldnt complain looked exactly pictures hotel refurbished time ago clean towels bed linen nice fragrance bath cosmetics breakfast tasty maybe selection quality especially coffee orange juice 4 hotels looking low budget hotel perfect recommend

Reviews.Title: “very nice hotel, 2-stars with the feeling of 3-stars”
Reviews.Author: bcooper30
Reviews.Content: arriving hotel scary doesnt look hotel outside feeling wrong elevator contribute feeling overall nice hotel reason missing star entrance guess clean breakfast nice service pretty ideal location rome bad 1015 minutes walking termini 2030 spanish steps theres close bus station 50 meters hotel

Reviews.Title: “Albergo Piave - Epic fail.”
Reviews.Author: tormojenie
Reviews.Content: personally hated hotel usually write reviews special treat booked 2 twin beds month beforehand hotels website fotos website reality called hotel occupying floor apartment building people live building strangers coming hotel understandable wouldnt neither arrived 8 pm lady owners wife family business tiny reception didnt booking list called 3 times arrival saying coming lady looked concentrated rigorous explained spoke english pretended doesnt understand russian tell speaking language ridiculous ok truly italian eventually speaking phone husband 2 twins 1 queen size bed pulled trying move sit bed cos space 2 time cant dirty wasnt clean didnt feel clean pillows smelled change thanks closet smelled clothing bit stinking eventually lot dust bed dont usually check floors hotels happened accidentally guess walls tiny hear pretty hotel breakfast tried frankly dont breakfast hotel rome cos breakfast special entertainment own hotel breakfast piave serve rotten ham coffee terrible stuff didnt feel welcoming tension owner special sense humor expresses opinion special alarm security system late night 10 pm careful main entrance door otherwise wrong wake owners wife appear bathrobe unhappy yes realize rome time spend hotel tired rest feel comfortable am sorry piave time wed spent epic fail spend 3 days piave guess travel ok hotel family wouldnt recommend

Reviews.Title: “Very nice”
Reviews.Author: Happy32655
Reviews.Content: arrived address ot hotel talk intercom immediatly building charming cage elevator 3rd floor greeted lovely couple beautifuly tastfully upgraded tiny functional clean pleasant stay price resonable makes capucino rome starbucks green envy helpful arranging tours calls pc email home cheerful helpful stay comfortable highly recommend little gem friends family
